result.title: Port of the Future training package
result.description: The Deliverable is defined as a means of transferring know-how on the developed concept of Port of the Future, the current state of the art and the impact that such an innovative project could have on the future of European ports and port cities to each and every one of the participants. Related task: 5.4 - Port of the future training package.

result.title: Scientific publications on neutrinos and CPV/2
result.description:
These publications will deal with all or part of the following topics:
- Updated review of experimental hints on leptonic CPV - Optimize strategies to determine nu mass hierarchy - Improved software for global neutrino oscillation data analysis - Example of neutrino mass model from flavour symmetries - Steps towards a multi-ton scale neutrinoless double beta decay experiment - Evaluate impact of new bb0nu constraints on BSM scenarios
